beers.notes: Notes of black tea, wildflower honey, white table grapes, and pumpernickel.
beers.description: Forest Night: English Mild. 4.2% Brewed with a plethora of specialty malts. Gently hopped in the kettle with Loral and over 30lbs of Medjool Dates.
beers.summary:
Forest Night: English Mild. 4.2% Brewed with a plethora of specialty malts. Gently hopped in the kettle with Loral and over 30lbs of Medjool Dates.
Notes of black tea, wildflower honey, white table grapes, and pumpernickel.

beers.notes: Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, chardonnay, and earth.
beers.description: Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #21. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
beers.summary:
Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #21. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, chardonnay, and earth.

beers.notes: Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.
beers.description: Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
beers.summary:
Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.

beers.notes: Notes of mimosa, fruit leather, dehydrated mango, and rainbow sorbet.
beers.description: Milkshake IPA 7.2% The latest heavily amplified psychedelic riff on THE boundary-pushing Culinary IPA series. Brewed with gobs of oats and lactose sugar.  Conditioned atop of luscious Madagascar vanilla beans, blood orange, strawberry and banana puree. Intensely hopped and then dry hopped with Mosaic and Citra. Huge Notes of mimosa, fruit leather, dehydrated mango, rainbow sorbet.
beers.summary:
Milkshake IPA 7.2% The latest heavily amplified psychedelic riff on THE boundary-pushing Culinary IPA series. Brewed with gobs of oats and lactose sugar.  Conditioned atop of luscious Madagascar vanilla beans, blood orange, strawberry and banana puree. Intensely hopped and then dry hopped with Mosaic and Citra. Huge Notes of mimosa, fruit leather, dehydrated mango, rainbow sorbet.
Notes of mimosa, fruit leather, dehydrated mango, and rainbow sorbet.

beers.notes: Notes of black cherry seltzer, kiwi berry, marigold, and strawberry jam.
beers.description: Ardmore Berry Grisette. 4.7% Brewed with Pilsner malt and raw wheat. Assertively hopped with Columbus and Spalt Select, then fermented with our Magickal Saison yeast. Conditioned on cherries, juneberries and white mulberries that were all foraged right here in Ardmore.
beers.summary:
Ardmore Berry Grisette. 4.7% Brewed with Pilsner malt and raw wheat. Assertively hopped with Columbus and Spalt Select, then fermented with our Magickal Saison yeast. Conditioned on cherries, juneberries and white mulberries that were all foraged right here in Ardmore.
Notes of black cherry seltzer, kiwi berry, marigold, and strawberry jam.

beers.notes: otes of  sticky gum, mineral water, tangerine lace, and Meyer lemon zest.
beers.description: Noble Hopped Saison. 5.4% Brewed with oats and spelt. Hopped in the kettle with an array of German hops. Fermented with our magickal saison yeast. Dry hopped with Callista and Hallertau Mittelfruh. Brewed in collaboration with our pal Joe Beddia.
beers.summary:
Noble Hopped Saison. 5.4% Brewed with oats and spelt. Hopped in the kettle with an array of German hops. Fermented with our magickal saison yeast. Dry hopped with Callista and Hallertau Mittelfruh. Brewed in collaboration with our pal Joe Beddia.
otes of  sticky gum, mineral water, tangerine lace, and Meyer lemon zest.

beers.notes: Notes of U-Pick farm fields, fruit leather, underripe blueberry, fresh berry jam.
beers.description: Strawberry Table Bier. 4.9% Brewed with spelt and lightly hopped with Idaho7. Conditioned for many moons on heaps of house made strawberry puree.
beers.summary:
Strawberry Table Bier. 4.9% Brewed with spelt and lightly hopped with Idaho7. Conditioned for many moons on heaps of house made strawberry puree.
Notes of U-Pick farm fields, fruit leather, underripe blueberry, fresh berry jam.

beers.notes: Notes of wild berries, raspberry leaf, trifoliate orange zest, and cantaloupe.
beers.description: Crushable Kolsch. 4.0% Brewed with purple corn. Collectively hopped in the kettle with hand selected Hull Melon. Fermented with our favorite Kolsch yeast then dry hopped with Hallertau Blanc. 10% of the proceeds of this beer will be donated to The Providence Animal Center.
beers.summary:
Crushable Kolsch. 4.0% Brewed with purple corn. Collectively hopped in the kettle with hand selected Hull Melon. Fermented with our favorite Kolsch yeast then dry hopped with Hallertau Blanc. 10% of the proceeds of this beer will be donated to The Providence Animal Center.
Notes of wild berries, raspberry leaf, trifoliate orange zest, and cantaloupe.

beers.notes: Notes of Champagne mango, bright rhubarb, French breakfast radish, and fresh cucumber.
beers.description: Carrot Brett Saison. 5.6% Brewed entirely with malted barley and cold pressed carrot juice from our local Ardmore pal, the Juice Dr.. Gently hopped in the kettle with Hallertau Mittelfruh. Primary Fermentation in stainless steel with our house brettanomyces ulture that we've harvested at our Dispensary.
beers.summary:
Carrot Brett Saison. 5.6% Brewed entirely with malted barley and cold pressed carrot juice from our local Ardmore pal, the Juice Dr.. Gently hopped in the kettle with Hallertau Mittelfruh. Primary Fermentation in stainless steel with our house brettanomyces ulture that we've harvested at our Dispensary.
Notes of Champagne mango, bright rhubarb, French breakfast radish, and fresh cucumber.
